DOC.brief_summary: During this double blind, placebo controlled, randomised cross over study, healthy volunteers received an enema once daily for one week containing either placebo (saline), 50mM butyrate or 100mM of butyrate. Before and directly after each test period a barostat protocol was performed to measure parameters for visceral perception.
DOC.brief_title: The Effects of Butyrate Enemas on Visceral Perception
DOC.criteria: healthy age, under 18 or over 65 use of pre or probiotics during study and 3 months previous to study previous bowel complaints gastrointestinal disease or abdominal surgery
